price: 24. Waxaa ka mid ah Calaamooyinkiisa inuu idin tusiyo hillaaca oo baqdin iyo rajoba leh, Wuxuu ka soo dejiyaa biyo (roob) daruuraha oo ku nooleeyaa arlada dhimashadeeda kaddib. Waxaa arrinkani ugu sugan calaamooyin ciddii wax fahmi.
arabic: وَمِنۡ ءَايَٰتِهِۦ يُرِيكُمُ ٱلۡبَرۡقَ خَوۡفٗا وَطَمَعٗا وَيُنَزِّلُ مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءٗ فَيُحۡيِۦ بِهِ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ بَعۡدَ مَوۡتِهَآۚ إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَأٓيَٰتٖ لِّقَوۡمٖ يَعۡقِلُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wamin āyātihi yurīkumu al-barqa khawfan waṭamaʿan wayunazzilu mina al-samāi māan fayuḥ'yī bihi al-arḍa baʿda mawtihā inna fī dhālika laāyātin liqawmin yaʿqilūna
